body:
This bug just keeps changing. See [bug 1377192](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1377192) for most of the details, but the gist of it is now that we need to respect the FHR pref mentioned above as well as add a new checkbox/pref to the new preferences page from our add-on that defaults to true and is also respected. A comment in the bug links to an example of how form autofill does this.

I intend to handle this eventually, but if someone else wants to snatch this up and do the work before I get to it feel free. Just ping me before you start so I can clarify the required behavior.
